title: Rainy night city driving with moderate speed and 12 braking events.
caption: A blue car drives down a rainy city street at moderate speed, with a bus and other cars on the road.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 2 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (softRainNight). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 5.6 m/s). There are 12 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed to maintain safety in the rainy conditions.
